title: Really easy mushroom risotto
description: This classic risotto presses all the right buttons, with intense porcini mushrooms and plump arborio rice.Each serving provides 480kcal, 10g protein, 75g carbohydrate (of which 4g sugars), 12g fat (of which 4g saturates), 3g fibre and 1.96g salt.
ingredients: salt and freshly ground black pepper
freshly grated parmesan (or similar vegetarian hard cheese), to serve
